description: Tommy Defendi is a bartender with a special talent. He is able to get any guy he wants with his big “love gun” and he has this couple in the bar in his crosshairs. Colby Jansen and Luke Adams are long time boyfriends and have never had a threesome before, that is, not until tonight. Tommy works his magic and has this couple eager to try new things. Tommy and Colby take turns railing Luke’s massive bubble butt, fucking him nice and deep.
title: Love Gun Part 1
